verses.roman:
ye-kāle vidāya hailā prabhura caraṇe
dui-janāra viccheda-daśā nā yāya varṇane

synonyms: ye-kāle—when; vidāya—farewell; hailā—there was; prabhura caraṇe—at the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dui-janāra—both of them; viccheda-daśā—condition of separation; nā yāya varṇane—cannot be described.
translation: The scene of separation that took place when Sanātana Gosvāmī and Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu took leave of one another is so piteous that it cannot be described herein.
